content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Used to convert iron ore into iron plates via coal-powered smelting.
• Furnace located at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Used to convert copper ore into copper plates via coal-powered smelting.
• Furnace located at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Usage Errors with get_entities  
  – Avoid using unsupported keyword arguments (e.g. remove ‘radius’).  
  – Ensure that the number and order of arguments match the function’s signature.

• Lab Placement and Retrieval Checks  
  – Confirm availability of the lab item in inventory before attempting placement.  
  – Guard against iterating over a None value by using an empty list fallback when no entities are retrieved.

• Lab Crafting Dependency Errors  
  – Verify that all sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, copper-cables, and electronic-circuits) are sufficiently produced before attempting lab crafting.  
  – Check that resource conversion (via smelting or crafting) meets the exact recipe requirements to prevent missing components.
